016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.junit5;
017
018import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.JsfTestConfiguration;
019import de.cuioss.test.jsf.util.ConfigurableApplication;
020import de.cuioss.test.jsf.util.JsfEnvironmentConsumer;
021import de.cuioss.test.jsf.util.JsfEnvironmentHolder;
022import de.cuioss.test.jsf.util.JsfRuntimeSetup;
023import de.cuioss.tools.logging.CuiLogger;
024import org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockFacesContext;
025import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterEachCallback;
026import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext;
027import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext.Namespace;
028import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.TestInstancePostProcessor;
029import org.junit.platform.commons.support.AnnotationSupport;
030
031import java.util.*;
032import java.util.stream.Collectors;
033
034import static de.cuioss.test.jsf.util.ConfigurationHelper.*;
035
036/**
037 * Starts and Configures the {@link JsfRuntimeSetup}, wraps it into an
038 * {@link JsfEnvironmentHolder} and inject it into an
039 * {@link JsfEnvironmentConsumer} if available
040 *
041 * @author Oliver Wolff
042 */
043public class JsfSetupExtension implements TestInstancePostProcessor, AfterEachCallback {
044
045    /**
046     * Identifies the {@link Namespace} under which the concrete instance of
047     * {@link JsfRuntimeSetup} is stored.
048     */
049    public static final Namespace NAMESPACE = Namespace.create("test", "jsf", "JsfRuntimeSetup");
050    private static final CuiLogger LOGGER = new CuiLogger(JsfSetupExtension.class);
051
052    private static void put(JsfRuntimeSetup runtimeSetup, ExtensionContext context) {
053        context.getStore(NAMESPACE).put(JsfRuntimeSetup.class.getName(), runtimeSetup);
054    }
055
056    @Override
057    @SuppressWarnings("squid:S3655")
058    public void postProcessTestInstance(Object testInstance, ExtensionContext context) throws Exception {
059        var setup = new JsfRuntimeSetup();
060        LOGGER.info(() -> "Starting JSF-Environment");
061        setup.setUp();
062        put(setup, context);
063
064        var useIdentityResourceBundle = false;
065        List<EnableJsfEnvironment> environments = new ArrayList<>();
066        retrieveEnableJSFAnnotations(testInstance.getClass(), environments);
067        if (!environments.isEmpty()) {
068            // Use the outermost annotation
069            useIdentityResourceBundle = environments.get(0).useIdentityResourceBundle();
070        }
071
072        var environment = new JsfEnvironmentHolder(setup);
073        ConfigurableApplication.createWrapAndRegister((MockFacesContext) environment.getFacesContext())
074            .setUseIdentityResourceBundle(useIdentityResourceBundle);
075
076        // Ensure that the ConfigurableApplication is set for
077        // JsfRuntimeSetup#getApplication
078        setup.setApplication(environment.getFacesContext().getApplication());
079
080        LOGGER.debug(() -> "Registering Decorators");
081        Set<JsfTestConfiguration> decoratorAnnotations = new LinkedHashSet<>(16);
082
083        retrieveDecoratorAnnotations(testInstance.getClass(), decoratorAnnotations);
084        decoratorAnnotations = decoratorAnnotations.stream().filter(Objects::nonNull).collect(Collectors.toSet());
085
086        configureApplication(testInstance, environment.getApplicationConfigDecorator(), decoratorAnnotations);
087        configureComponents(testInstance, environment.getComponentConfigDecorator(), decoratorAnnotations);
088        configureRequestConfig(testInstance, environment.getRequestConfigDecorator(), decoratorAnnotations);
089
090        if (testInstance instanceof JsfEnvironmentConsumer consumer) {
091            consumer.setEnvironmentHolder(environment);
092        }
093    }
094
095    private void retrieveDecoratorAnnotations(Class<?> type, Set<JsfTestConfiguration> result) {
096        if (null == type || Object.class.equals(type)) {
097            return;
098        }
099        result.addAll(AnnotationSupport.findRepeatableAnnotations(type, JsfTestConfiguration.class));
100        retrieveDecoratorAnnotations(type.getSuperclass(), result);
101    }
102
103    private void retrieveEnableJSFAnnotations(Class<?> type, List<EnableJsfEnvironment> result) {
104        if (null == type || Object.class.equals(type)) {
105            return;
106        }
107        result.addAll(AnnotationSupport.findRepeatableAnnotations(type, EnableJsfEnvironment.class));
108        retrieveEnableJSFAnnotations(type.getSuperclass(), result);
109    }
110
111    @Override
112    public void afterEach(ExtensionContext context) {
113        LOGGER.debug(() -> "Tear-Down JSF-Environment");
114        get(context).ifPresent(JsfRuntimeSetup::tearDown);
115    }
116
117    private Optional<JsfRuntimeSetup> get(ExtensionContext context) {
118        return Optional.ofNullable((JsfRuntimeSetup) context.getStore(NAMESPACE).get(JsfRuntimeSetup.class.getName()));
119    }
120}
